content:
The avatar is at row=7, col=1. There are monsters around. I want to avoid them and find a safe place. The monster at (7,6) is close. Moving right might be risky, so I will try moving down.
Action: 3
I expect to move down to row 8, col 1, away from the monster.

The avatar is at (8, 1). There are monsters at (2, 5), (5, 3), (5, 4), (7, 7), (12, 5). There are boxes at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), (12, 24). I should move towards the boxes. I will move right.
Action: 2
I expect to move to the right.

The avatar is at (8, 2). There are monsters at (2, 6), (5, 4), (6, 4), (7, 7), and (12, 5). There are boxes at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), and (12, 24). The goal is probably to push the boxes. I will try to move right to explore the level.
Action: 2
I expect the avatar to move one step to the right.

The avatar is at row=8, col=3. There are monsters around me at (2,6), (5,4), (6,4), (7,7), (12,5). There are boxes at (2,10), (2,16), (2,24), (12,10), (12,16), (12,24). It looks like the boxes are located at the right side of the map. Let's move right to explore the area.
Action: 2
I expect to move right to explore the area.
